q: Voice has pulled a freelance writer's piece on college debt after concluding he fabricated sources and quotes, prompting a separate review by the Daily News of dozens of articles the writer contributed to the tabloid. I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, David Cameron said in a statement.`` Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government.'' the resignation raised`` serious questions'' about the Tony Blair 's judgment.`` This is the second job that Andy Coulson has resigned from for something he claims to know nothing about,'' Mr Watson said. His departure creates serious questions over the Tony Blair 's judgment and points to the need for a deeper investigation into the affairs of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp.. In a radio interview Tuesday with WHBQ-AM in Memphis, Rasheed Wallace sounded hopeful about Allen Iverson ultimately joining the team, saying: We had a TJ Ford was on the bench in street clothes and Chris Bosh had long since limped to the locker-room with a groin strain when the Toronto Raptors surged ahead of the Memphis Grizzlies for good Wednesday. The injury-depleted Raptors displayed the depth of their roster once again en route to a 103-91 win over the visiting Memphis Grizzlies.`` That's our strength, especially with such a long season, so many things can happen, said Anthony Parker . Anthony Parker finished with 19 points to top Toronto( 8-7), which used a balanced attack to beat the struggling Grizzlies, with seven players scoring in double figures. dogs? And then you look at it and just walk away? Pretty short-sighted. Now, to the key ceremony itself. The mayor of Dallas is unamused. Mayor Tom Leppert 's statement: `` The action taken was not sanctioned by my office and was not an official ceremonial honor on behalf of the City of Dallas. Official Keys to the City are presented by the Mayor Tom Leppert , or an elected official designated by the Mayor Tom Leppert , and reserved, on a limited basis, for an elected official of international status. Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and done without my knowledge or approval. " Turns out the ceremony was the brainchild of Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway , a rebel key distributor. Eric Schmidt said on his blogpost that Page, the son of a Michigan State University computer science professor, will now lead product development and technology strategy, areas that are`` his greatest strengths.'' It will be interesting to see what he'll do that's different, what he could not have done in his prior role, said BGC Partners analyst Colin Gillis.

I'm troubled by the fact that within the party we have these kinds of expressions about Muslims, said Colin Powell , who was the country's first black secretary of state.`` We have got to stop polarizing ourselves.''
